name: Walk the Dog (Peter Hann)
description:
This is for everyone who's staying at home due current events.

A  tiny, relaxing, cute little game where you take a walk in your backyard and play fetch with your dog. Might contain smaller bugs and glitches.  Don't expect too much of it - it is what it is :-)

Enjoy - stay save!

Regarding donations: we would happily accept any donations as every little bit help's  to further work on our main project "Mileage" - however, if you can't afford to, don't feel obligated. In case we reach 100$ or more I might be able to put it on Steam as well.

Windows PC (DirectX11 required)  |  MacOS (barely tested)
